runs.comm: slides one down leg, rare MSD miss allows a bye

how quick was that stumping? Faster than the Bailey stumping, I reckon. Dilshan's comeback doesn't go as per plan. This one was a slider that goes across him, Dilshan looked to flay that, misses it and ends up dragging his backfoot outside the crease. Dhoni breaks the bails in one single motion
loopy one on middle, tucked to short midwicket
this one's a carrom ball, he sweeps and misses and is hit high on the pad. Maybe it pitched outside leg too
drops it wide of cover with soft hands for a quick single
comes back in with the angle, defended to midwicket
slow turn from middle and off, pats it to short cover. Top over

excellent catch by Yuvraj running in from mid-off. Prasanna looks to go over the infield, only manages to get the toe end. Wicket off his first ball for Nehra, or Nehra Ji as his good friend Sehwag calls him
gets a thin inside edge as he looks to drive on the up, Dhoni manages to stop that
swings away from off, played to mid-off
hurries onto him from the good length area on off stump, jabbed to cover

steps out to go over mid-on, ends up dragging it, Pandya took two steps to his right and then got in the dive, but couldn't hold on. Tough chance, but full marks for the effort. Lucky escape for Chandimal
thrashed into the cover boundary at the rate of knots. Hint of width and he threw his bat at that, pinged the middle of the bat. Nehra has a big grin nevertheless
gets a good stride forward and dabs it to the off side
backs away to to over the top but Ashwin slows it down nicely and lands it on middle and leg, defended
gets a thick inside edge towards deep square
worked with the spin to deep midwicket
drops it onto the leg side and scoots across for a single
half-stop by Raina at midwicket but can't prevent the single

squeezed down the ground, Hardik Pandya running across from mid-on slides to stop but nearly ends up deflecting it to the boundary in his quest to push it towards Yuvraj at mid-off. Quickly recovers to dish in the dive and pull it back in though
another one bites the dust. Hint of movement away from the length area on middle and off, he pokes his bat out half-heartedly, gets a thin inside edge that flies through to Dhoni.
slides one full and across the batsman, left alone
play and a miss. Too close to play that into the gap between cover and point off the frontfoot
excellent bouncer, hustled him for pace, he goes for the hook, ball gets big on him but still gets a boundary as the ball crosses the fine leg fence
tucked to midwicket for a quick single
rolls his wrists over that one and gets it to square leg
worked with the spin to midwicket
loopy delivery on middle and leg, nurdled past short fine leg
angled to short third man, didn't have much room to work with on that occasion
waits for it to spin back in, tucked to square leg
misses the tickle down leg, MS fumbles but they won't get a bye this time
looks to swing that one over midwicket, slices it over cover, the infielders run back to get to that
swing and a miss. Looks to hit that into neighbouring Patna, connects with the cool evening air
too close to the stumps, runs it down to third man
walks across the stumps and mows it over midwicket, one bounce into the boundary. This one was a touch ahead of the length area, whacked away cleanly
that is a scorcher. Leans forward, opens his wrists a bit to hit that to the left of the cover fielder. Nehra has a bemused look on his face
tucked towards midwicket for an easy single
poor first ball, half-tracker on middle, pulled to deep midwicket. Lucky to get away with that
excellent stop by Pandya at mid-off, was hit hard
worked towards deep midwicket, Jadeja fumbles but recovers quickly to keep it down to a single
squeezed to the cover fielder
nicely tossed up, lands it on middle, driven back to the bowler
driven wide of the diving Ashwin at cover
plays the switch hit, but no timing whatsoever, lands just short of Dhawan, who comes charging in from deep cover
worked across the line to mid-on
leading edge, just lobs over Jadeja's head
bunted to Pandey at cover
sliding into middle and leg, worked to deep midwicket
clears long-off effortlessly. Nicely tossed up and he got underneath that well and smacked it over the ropes
fired into middle and leg, turned to deep midwicket
pushed to point where Rohit hares to the ball quickly
inside-edges a firm push towards deep square
uses the pace and angles it to Pandya at short third man
driven through the line to the extra cover fielder
round-arm delivery, lands it too short though, pulled away into the gap between deep square and deep midwicket, top work by Bumrah, sliding across to prevent it from crossing the boundary
backs away and slaps it to deep cover
grip and turn from middle, pushed to cover
fired in quicker, angled to short third man, slight mifield by Yuvraj but they would've got one anyway
flat hit to Rahane at long-off
worked with the angle to deep midwicket

magnificent catch by Rohit, inches off the turf at long off. It needs a lot of guts to dive full length forward on this outfield, and he's made it look easy. Coming back to the ball, this one was fired into middle, Kapu steps out and looks to swing it over the ropes, gets it off the toe end, no timing or power behind the stroke. Rohit anticipated that one nice and early, got to the ball but it looks like he didn't fully get his hands underneath that. What commitment
backs away and punches it to Raina at extra cover
look to go over long-on, gets a thick inside edge, one bounce to the fielder

this one goes through Rohit at wide long-off. It was hit like a rocket, Rohit dived over the ball. Seems to have hurt his knee, or is it cramps? Got the slide around well but jammed his knee on this hard turf
mistimes a lofted hit to deep midwicket
swing and a miss, hits the pad but well outside leg
darted onto the leg stump, hacked to cow corner
Jadeja tosses this up on off, Kapu attacks him and gives him the charge. He lofts it in the air. Pandya runs across to his left from long-on and completes a smart catch

another appeal for stumping. Quick, quick work from Dhoni. Jadeja finds just enough turn and bounce to beat the outside edge. Chandimal reached out and pushed outside off as his balance is foiled. The back foot was in the air when Dhoni whipped the bails off in a flash; well faster then flash in fact
pushed through on off, defended. Hat-trick ball averted
down the track and tapped back to the bowler
Shanaka uses his feet again, eased to long-off
flighted on middle, the batsman dances out and bunts it back to Raina
eased to long-on
flatter and outside off, punched on the back foot. Rahane dives to his right and fumbles at backward point
Siri jumps back and flays it wide of Rahane now
slides into the pads, Siri is on the move as he flicks through square leg
clean connection, maximum result. Gets under that tossed up delivery and swings it with the spin over deep midwicket
squeezed to short third man
worked across the line to square leg
too full on the pads, flicked to Raina at midwicket
steps out and lofts him down to deep midwicket, Rohit comes around but can't get prevent the second
dabs it towards short third man
flatter one on middle, punched to long on
top shot! Muscular hit over long-off. Flat one too. Too full, gets underneath that one and boom!
helped into the fine leg region, Rahane comes around to stop that
mows it across the line to wide long-on
that one was in his arc, it flew off the middle and sailed into the stands at deep midwicket. Predictable with his lengths and is getting punished
slow turn back into middle and leg, pulled to deep midwicket
starts off with a cracking yorker, right into the blockhole from wide of the crease, a near toe-crusher that Malinga would have been proud of, he managed to get his bat down in time though
another excellent yorker, angled towards his left toe again, squeezed down to long on
excellent change of pace, this one was a slower delivery, but he picked the length nice and early before unfurling his wrists to ease it behind point. Opened the bat face slightly, neat execution
floats it well down leg, easy call for the umpire
full and straight on off, he gets a tick outside edge to third man
looks to back away and scoop it over Dhoni's head, misses

slogged across the line, for a moment it looked like Pandya at long-on was in business, but it just sailed over his head. A mishit gone for a six. All Bumrah can do is have a laugh about it and walk back to his fielding position
slogged across the line to Dhawan at deep midwicket

tries to bowl a leg break but it ends up being a long hop, it's a different matter altogether that he still gets a wicket. Shanaka could have hit this wherever he pleased; looked to swing it across the line over midwicket, but face turned in his hand and lobbed straight towards Raina, who takes a well-judged catch at long-off
gets a thick inside edge onto the pad as he looks to hit it across the line over deep midwicket

as easy as they come for Ashwin. Beautifully tossed up, gets the batsman to step out, Thisara didn't get to the pitch and ended up slicing it to Rahane at short third man. Third for Ashwin, the hat-trick man is out for a duck
slower through the air, lands it on middle and leg, he's through with the slog even before the ball gets to him, hit high on the body
backs away and hits it towards sweeper cover
slower one that grips the surface, he was through with the stroke, lands in no-man's land, covered up by the man running in from long-on
excellent yorker there, no room for the batsman to work with, squeezes it back to the bowler

too late to get down to the ball. It was full and straight delivery angling into middle from wide of the crease, missed it altogether as he looked to whip that over midwicket, and an easy decision for umpire Anil Chaudhary
ball has smashed into Chameera's toe. This is outstanding stuff. Excellent pace as well, he fails to get his bat down to the ball, hit on the back foot. Stinging blow
rip roaring bouncer, he was almost expecting a yorker but suddenly saw the ball arriving at a furious pace towards the helmet, somehow avoids it

doesn't get better than this. Can't remember the last time an Indian bowler bowled yorkers on demand like this. This one was full and straight, not quite the yorker though, nicely angled in from wide of the crease, Chameera was through with the stroke, big gap between bat and pad as the ball sneaks through to hit the furniture
gets a thick inside edge to Nehra at short fine leg
floats it full on middle, bunted to long on
squeezed to the cover fielder
full ball on off, jabs his bat down to get a thin bottom edge, bounces through to Dhoni
low full toss on middle, driven to long-on
slower one on middle and off, angled wide of point
off cutter, lands it on middle, bunted to the off side
gets a thin edge that scoots along the ground, Dhoni fumbles and they squeeze a run
full toss on the pads, hit to deep midwicket
how did that miss the off stump, I don't know. Another full length delivery that keeps coming back in, pushes outside the line, beaten
bunts the low full toss to Jadeja at cover
full delivery on off, nips back in, he watches it through to the keeper
